mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OFF_CLASS ( c_sq, u_sq, img_sq, c_dt, c_st, c_gb, c_category_st, c_area_st, c_title, u_start_dt, c_end_dt, c_time, c_small_no, c_big_no, c_apply_no, c_adr, c_cost_no, c_web_adr ) VALUES ( #{classId}, #{usrId}, #{atchFileId}, sysdate, #{classSt}, #{classGb}, #{classCtSt}, #{classAreaSt}, #{classTitle}, TO_DATETIME(#{classStartDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATETIME(#{classEndDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{classTime}, #{classSmallNo}, #{classBigNo}, #{classApplyNo}, #{classAdr}, #{classCost}, #{classWebAdr})
